oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Press conference and Medallion ceremony - Dolly Parton - 1999-09-22
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Dolly Parton press conference and presentation of her Country Music Hall of Fame medallion. Press conference held in the library reading room of the music row Hall of Fame building and the medallion ceremony was held in the lobby of the Music Row Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum held on September 22 1999.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:date: Date not given but internet sources list it as 1999-09-22.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Dolly Parton; Kyle Young; Bill Purcell; Don Sundquist; Porter Wagoner; E. W. Wendell; Emmylou Harris; Alison Krauss; Stella Parton;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Includes off microphone questions from the press in attendance (00:00) Press conference with Dolly Parton / subjects include the Country Music Hall of Fame, her bluegrass album, the Dixie Chicks, Shania Twain, possible television series, how she sees herself (14:53) Medallion ceremony beginning with opening comments by Kyle Young / (15:22) introduction of Dolly Parton / (15:50) Opening comments by Kyle Young / (18:19) Nashville Mayor Bill Purcell with comments / (20:10) Kyle Young continues with medallion ceremony / (20:44) Tennessee Governor Don Sundquist with comments / (23:02) Governor Sundquist introduces Porter Wagoner / (23:35) Porter Wagoner with comments / (28:23) Kyle continues with ceremony / (28:51) Bruce Hinton with comments / (34:05) Emmylou Harris with comments / (37:55) Emmylou Harris performs To Daddy / (41:05) Kyle with continuing comments / (41:56) E. W. "Bud" Wendell with comments / (44:04) Bud Wendell present medallion to Parton /

(44:47) Dolly Parton with acceptance speech / (48:21) Dolly performs My Tennessee Mountain Home with Stella Parton and Alison Krauss / (56:30) Coat Of Many Colors (Dolly Parton with Alison Krauss) / (01:00:27) Closing comments by Kyle Young /
